hero.title: Elevating Talent Through Refined Artistry
hero.subtitle: Discover excellence in casting with Laberge Casting
hero.description: We elevate talent through refined artistry and sophisticated casting solutions.

about.title: About Us
about.description: At Laberge Casting, we believe in the power of exceptional talent and refined artistry. Our mission is to connect extraordinary individuals with opportunities that showcase their unique abilities.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We offer comprehensive casting services tailored to meet the diverse needs of our clients and talent.

portfolio.title: Portfolio
portfolio.description: Explore our collection of successful casting projects and collaborations.

talent.title: Talent
talent.description: Meet the exceptional individuals who make up our diverse talent roster.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Get in touch with our team to discuss your casting needs or to join our talent roster.

confidential.title: 100% Confidential
confidential.description: Your information remains private and is never shared without your consent.

allStories.title: ALL Types of profiles Accepted
allStories.description: Big or small, funny or moving, every story and bit of information you share with us is useful.

storiesCollected.title: 1000+ Profiles Collected
storiesCollected.description: So many unique paths that fuel our projects and inspire us every day.

realStories.title: Real Stories
realStories.subtitle: Whether it's about your work, your family, a life-changing experience, a deep passion, an unexpected path, or simply the beauty of everyday life, your story could resonate far beyond what you imagine.

loveStory.quote: My bond with Jonas blossomed through epistolary exchanges: he was a young scout in Africa, and I, a scout in Quebec. We grew up, built our own lives, had children, yet we always kept our bond alive through ink. After losing our spouses, our letters became a promise, and he crossed the ocean to be with me. The years by his side were the most beautiful of my life. Jonas is gone now, but his love still lives in every page of my story.
loveStory.author: - Lyse Morency

resilience.quote: The day I was told I was bipolar, I thanked the heavens it was treatable. I wasn't crazy after all... just sick.
resilience.author: - Louis Murray

stepmom.tag: A Stepmom Who Rewrites the Rules
stepmom.quote: I'm in the process of building my own eco-friendly home in a unique family setup: me, my partner, his three kids, the kids' mother, and her partner. A blended family, reinvented and upgraded... and then there's the stepmom role in all of this. I would love to rewrite the narrative around this often underestimated role!
stepmom.author: - Abrielle Sirois-Cournoyer

tellYourStory.title: Tell us about yourself
tellYourStory.description:
Take the leap, it's a real opportunity to get on screen.

There is nothing to lose, and no on-camera experience is required.

Whether for TV, ads, documentaries, web series, podcasts or extra castings, everything is possible.

form.name: Full Name
form.success: Thank you! Your story has been sent.
form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again in a moment.

placeholders.name: Enter your full name
placeholders.story: Share things like your work, interests, sports, communities, journey, or anecdotes.

video.title: Experience Excellence
video.subtitle: Where Stories Come to Life
video.description: Real People. Real Stories. Join our pool and let your personality shine on screen
video.accessibility: Full-screen video showcasing Laberge Casting's work at Musée de la civilisation in Quebec

video2.headline: We turn everyday personalities into unforgettable screen moments.
video2.description: From moodboards to fittings and improvisations, every casting session is designed to let true personality surface. Authenticity is the camera-ready advantage.
video2.ctaNote: Prefer a quick chat? Email us for a private preview reel.
